domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Scientists urge caution around pangolin 'link' in spread of deadly coronavirus
entity.description: In a study of samples from over 1,000 wild animals, scientists at South China Agricultural University on Friday claimed to link the world's only scaly mammal, pangolins, to the outbreak of the coronavirus due to a 99% identical genome sequence when compared to infected persons. International scientists are advising caution with the alleged link, stating that more information from the study must be released in order to determine how the virus was passed to humans.

text: @nature If only one good thing comes from the #coronavirus, i hope that it’s that this precious endangered speices gets to survive. Even if it’s misinformation, this is once instance I wouldn’t mind. Just to stop the poaching and killing these animals 🦔 #endangered #pangolin #govegan
